title: All night Pirith Chanting at parliament to invoke blessings on the country
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera) All night Pirith Chanting ceremony was held at the Sri Jayawardenapura-Kotte Parliamentary Complex last night on 18th April to invoke blessings on the country and the people before the convening of the maiden session of the seventh parliament on Thursday.
